pages.text: The $(item)Displacement Rune$() increases the transfer rate of $(blood)Life Essence$() into and out of the Blood Altar when pumping to or from an external tank.$(br2)Each $(item)Displacement Rune$() increases this rate by (20 * n^1.2) where 'n' is the number of $(item)Displacement Runes$() in the altar.
